page.title: 05A WILMSLOW PLAYGROUP
page.content: In the town we live there are a few playschools, we visited one called Kids. The private playschool was established in{September 1983}because many parents needed to work for financial reasons and to send their children to a place to be looked after.{150}children come to the playschool but{only 45}are full timers. The one to two year olds enjoy playing with the sand and water but the three to four year olds like playing Mr. Men programs on the computer. Although they are playing they are learning at the same time. Inside the playschool there is an elephant shaped menu for lunch.In one room there are cots for the babies to sleep. The parents pay monthly.
